description: Adds a member to a channel. The InvitedBy field in ChannelMembership is derived from the request header. A channel member can: Privacy settings impact this action as follows:

parameters.name: ChannelArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the channel to which you're adding users.

parameters.name: MemberArn
parameters.description: The AppInstanceUserArn of the member you want to add to the channel.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description: The membership type of a user, DEFAULT or HIDDEN. Default members are always returned as part of ListChannelMemberships. Hidden members are only returned if the type filter in ListChannelMemberships equals HIDDEN. Otherwise hidden members are not returned. This is only supported by moderators.

parameters.name: ChimeBearer
parameters.description: The ARN of the AppInstanceUser or AppInstanceBot that makes the API call.

parameters.name: SubChannelId
parameters.description: The ID of the SubChannel in the request.

nested_items.name: SubChannelId
nested_items.description: The ID of the SubChannel in the response.
